    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Force of gravity in apples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft von Schwerkraft in den Äpfeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force de la pesanteur dans les pommes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força da gravidade nas maçãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza di gravità in mele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη της βαρύτητας στα μήλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza de la gravedad en manzanas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the force of gravity between two apples is very small because they have very small mass. The force of gravity between an apple and the Earth is quite large because Earth's mass is very large.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Apple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Kraft von 
Schwerkraft zwischen zwei Äpfeln sehr klein ist, weil sie sehr kleine
Masse haben. Die Kraft von Schwerkraft zwischen einem Apfel und 
der Masse ist ziemlich groß, weil Masse der Masse sehr groß ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la force de la 
pesanteur entre deux pommes est très petite parce qu'elles ont la 
masse très petite. La force de la pesanteur entre une pomme et 
la terre est tout à fait grande parce que la masse de la terre est 
très grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a força de uma 
gravidade entre duas maçãs é muito pequena porque têm a massa 
muito pequena. A força da gravidade entre uma maçã e a terra 
é completamente grande porque a massa da terra é muito grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la forza di 
gravità fra due mele è molto piccola perché hanno massa molto 
piccola. La forza di gravità fra una mela e la terra è 
abbastanza grande perché la massa della terra è molto grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η δύναμη της βαρύτητας
μεταξύ δύο μήλων είναι πολύ μικρή επειδή έχουν την πολύ 
μικρή μάζα. Η δύναμη της βαρύτητας μεταξύ ενός μήλου και 
της γης είναι αρκετά μεγάλη επειδή η γήινη μάζα είναι πολύ 
μεγάλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la fuerza de la 
gravedad entre dos manzanas es muy pequeña porque tienen masa muy 
pequeña. La fuerza de la gravedad entre una manzana y la tierra
es absolutamente grande porque la masa de la tierra es muy grande.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Apple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
